body: Thanks, I have removed this test and added new tests in hlo_evaluator_test.cc which would have failed if HandleCall, HandleFusion and HandleConditional were not handled properly. I have also changed the test a little bit so that the `Evaluate` function returns `StatusOr<Literal>` rather than `Literal` as it seemed to me better that way and made my test cases neater. Let me know if you want me to change it back.
body_html: Thanks, I have removed this test and added new tests in hlo_evaluator_test.cc which would have failed if HandleCall, HandleFusion and HandleConditional were not handled properly. I have also changed the test a little bit so that the Evaluate function returns StatusOr<Literal> rather than Literal as it seemed to me better that way and made my test cases neater. Let me know if you want me to change it back.
body_text: Thanks, I have removed this test and added new tests in hlo_evaluator_test.cc which would have failed if HandleCall, HandleFusion and HandleConditional were not handled properly. I have also changed the test a little bit so that the Evaluate function returns StatusOr<Literal> rather than Literal as it seemed to me better that way and made my test cases neater. Let me know if you want me to change it back.
